### [Creating an entity identifier](/documentation/AppIntents/EntityIdentifier/init(activityIdentifier:)#Creating-an-entity-identifier)

[`init<Entity>(for: Entity)`](/documentation/appintents/entityidentifier/init(for:))Creates an identifier for the specified entity[`init<Entity>(for: Entity.Type, identifier: Entity.ID)`](/documentation/appintents/entityidentifier/init(for:identifier:))Creates an `EntityIdentifier` representing an instance of the specified entity type backed by the specified identifier value.
